attributes.action: Force company's to only use credit checking or credit scoring for agreements where credit is granted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are fed up of the "computer says no" mentality that this nation is now adopting.

We request that the prime minister force companies to only use credit checking or credit scoring for applications for credit (ie applications under the consumer credit act 1974). We do not believe that other services that do not provide credit regulated by this act should be allowed to make credit searches as they are not providing credit
